backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor defining Product, Order, ContactSubmission, and BlogPost types with CRUD operations, query methods, coupon code application, and migration support.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module that converts a legacy flat array of Products into a Map-based structure for the updated actor state.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping implemented frontend/backend features to their source files, component dependencies, test IDs, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON dictionary of short descriptions for each frontend source file, summarizing purpose and notable fixes for each component, page, hook, and style file.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base CSS file defining OKLCH-based CSS custom properties for light and dark theme color tokens used throughout the app.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML entry point that mounts the React app into a root div and loads the main TypeScript module.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component that sets up TanStack Router with all application routes, wraps the layout in Cart and Wishlist context providers, and initializes sample backend content on load.
frontend/src/components/BestSellers.tsx: Home page section displaying the top 4 products fetched via React Query, with loading skeletons and a link to the full shop.
frontend/src/components/BlogPostCard.tsx: Card component for a blog post showing a cover image, category badge, title, excerpt, author, and formatted date with a link to the full post page.
frontend/src/components/CategoryFilter.t: Filter chip bar rendering category buttons with active/inactive styling, allowing users to select a product category.
frontend/src/components/FeaturedCategori: Renders a grid of home decor category cards (Living Room, Bedroom, Kitchen, etc.) with images and links to the shop page filtered by category.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Site footer with brand info, social media links, quick navigation links, and contact details including address, phone, and email.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Sticky site header with logo, desktop/mobile navigation, cart item count badge, wishlist link, and admin dashboard icon.
frontend/src/components/Hero.tsx: Full-width hero section with a background image, headline, CTA buttons linking to shop and about pages, and a highlights bar showing key selling points.
frontend/src/components/InstagramGallery: Displays a 6-tile Instagram-style photo grid with hover overlay effects, each tile linking to the Instagram profile.
frontend/src/components/ProductCard.tsx: Product card component showing image, category badge, name, description, price, and hover-revealed add-to-cart and wishlist buttons with a link to the product detail page.
frontend/src/components/ProductCatalog.t: Product listing section that fetches products by category, renders a category filter, skeleton loaders, error/empty states, and a responsive grid of ProductCard components.
frontend/src/components/ShippingReturnAc: Renders an accordion component with three sections: Shipping Information, Return Policy, and Care Instructions, each containing static bullet-point details.
frontend/src/components/Testimonials.tsx: Displays a static testimonials section with three customer reviews including star ratings, quotes, and author info in a dark-themed grid layout.
frontend/src/components/WhatsAppButton.t: Renders a fixed floating WhatsApp chat button that opens a pre-filled WhatsApp message to a hardcoded phone number.
frontend/src/contexts/CartContext.tsx: Provides a React context for cart state management with add, remove, update, and clear operations, persisting cart items to localStorage with BigInt serialization support.
frontend/src/contexts/WishlistContext.ts: Provides a React context for wishlist state management with add, remove, and move-to-cart operations, persisting wishlist items to localStorage with BigInt serialization support.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom hook that creates and caches an ICP backend actor using React Query, supporting both authenticated and anonymous identities, and invalidates dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity authentication via a React context and hook, managing AuthClient creation, login/logout flow, and identity persistence across page reloads.
frontend/src/hooks/useMutations.ts: Exports React Query mutation hooks for backend write operations including placing orders, applying coupons, submitting contacts, adding products/blog posts, and initializing sample content.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Exports React Query hooks for fetching products (with optional category filter), orders, contact submissions, and blog posts from the ICP backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Global CSS file that imports Google Fonts (Playfair Display, Lato), sets up Tailwind directives, and defines a luxury design system with CSS custom properties for light/dark themes including ivory, champagne gold, and matte black palettes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: React app entry point that wraps the App component with QueryClientProvider (React Query) and InternetIdentityProvider before mounting to the DOM.
frontend/src/pages/About.tsx: About page component displaying the brand story, vision/mission, and team sections with a hero image, styled using the luxury design system.
frontend/src/pages/Admin.tsx: Admin dashboard page with tabbed navigation for overview, products, orders, contacts, and blog management, including forms to add products and blog posts via mutation hooks.
frontend/src/pages/Blog.tsx: Blog listing page that fetches and displays blog post cards in a grid, with loading skeletons, error state, and an empty state using the useBlogPosts query hook.
frontend/src/pages/BlogPost.tsx: Individual blog post detail page that looks up a post by ID from the blog posts query, renders a hero image, metadata, excerpt, and parses basic markdown-style headings in the body.
frontend/src/pages/Cart.tsx: Shopping cart page that displays cart items with quantity controls and removal, shows a subtotal, and links to checkout; renders an empty state when the cart has no items.
frontend/src/pages/Checkout.tsx: Checkout page that collects guest name, email, and shipping address, supports coupon code application, and places an order via mutations, showing a success confirmation screen upon completion.
frontend/src/pages/Contact.tsx: Contact page with a validated form (name, email, subject, message) that submits via a mutation and displays a success state, alongside static contact info (address, phone, email).
frontend/src/pages/Home.tsx: Home page that composes the Hero, FeaturedCategories, BestSellers, Testimonials, and InstagramGallery section components.
frontend/src/pages/ProductDetail.tsx: Product detail page that fetches a product by ID, displays its image, details, quantity selector, add-to-cart/wishlist actions, a shipping accordion, and related products.
frontend/src/pages/Shop.tsx: Shop page that lists products with category filtering, text search, price range filtering, and sort order controls, rendering skeleton loaders while data is fetched.
frontend/src/pages/Wishlist.tsx: Wishlist page that displays saved products in a grid, allowing users to remove items or move them to the cart, with an empty-state prompt to browse products.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration for the luxury e-commerce frontend, defining custom fonts (Lato, Playfair Display), OKLCH-based color tokens (ivory, beige, gold, matte-black, sidebar, chart), border radii, box shadows, and keyframe animations for accordion and fade effects.
project_state.json: Project state manifest (version 7) describing the 'Signature Home Decor LLP' luxury e-commerce site's architecture, feature list, known issues, color palette, category structure, and build history for planning and continuity purposes.
